General.Name: Hurricane Energy plc
General.Description: Hurricane Energy plc, together with its subsidiaries, discovers, appraises, and develops hydrocarbon resources from fractured basement reservoirs on the United Kingdom Continental Shelf, West of Shetland. Its licenses focused on the Rona Ridge; and assets comprise Lancaster, Lincoln, Halifax, and Warwick Crest. The company was formerly known as Hurricane Exploration plc and changed its name to Hurricane Energy plc in April 2013. Hurricane Energy plc was founded in 2004 and is headquartered in Godalming, the United Kingdom. As of June 8, 2023, Hurricane Energy plc operates as a subsidiary of Prax Global Finance I PLC.
General.Address: The Wharf, Godalming, United Kingdom, GU7 2QN
